reviews.review: Jogo sensacional, realmente, acho que a valve fazia jogos incríveis, portal é um deles, a historia, os detalhes, a emoção de jogar o jogo, eu amo esse jogo, recomendo MT

ótima lore e mecânicas incríveis, alem de poder aproveitar toda a experiência de portal 2 em single player existe o modo cooperativo onde tem como jogar com amigos tanto a campanha cooperativa quanto o modo competitivo, se está pensando em comprar esse jogo eu recomendo
已买，卡罗琳唱歌很好汀，很温柔，我们的婚后生活非常幸福
的确是一款开发智力的游戏，想玩好不仅要有操作，还要有另类的思想。

Let's face it, by this point, everyone knows what Portal 2, and the Portal series in general, is. All there really is to say is that, if you like puzzle games, especially puzzle games with story, Portal is one of the best series for you, especially Portal 2 with it's witty humour, and co-op mode where you can endlessly troll friends, and then when those friends get mad at you, get another friend to play with you until you have no friends left. Fun experience for all involved! But in all seriousness, I have played through the co-op with at least 5 different friends, and have always had a fun time, even with my bad memory meaning I forget solutions. Would absolutely recommend as a fun co-op game.
